```{r, packages loading and default set,echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(glmnet)
library(lassoshooting)
library(mvtnorm)
library(pROC)
library(rmutil)
library(grplasso)
library(Matrix)
library(sim1000G)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
source('fastCOMMUTE_functions.R')

```

```{r defaulted values}
id <- 1# set 1 first to try. id <- as.numeric(Sys.getenv("SLURM_ARRAY_TASK_ID"))
sim_setting <- expand.grid(sim = 1:100, delta = 0.8, h = c("(10,10;10)","(30,30;30)","(60,60;60)","(10,60;60)"), r = 25)

sim = sim_setting[id, 'sim']
sig.delta = sim_setting[id, 'delta'] 
# h.tmp = sim_setting[id, 'h'] 
# h = c(as.numeric(gsub(".*\\((.*)\\,.*", "\\1", h.tmp)), as.numeric(gsub(".*\\,(.*)\\;.*", "\\1", h.tmp)), as.numeric(gsub(".*\\;(.*)\\).*", "\\1", h.tmp)))

r = sim_setting[id, 'r']
dir_out = 'path_to_save_result'

exact = FALSE             #TRUE=S1; FALSE=S2
K = 3                     #total number of source population 
p = 80                  #number of variables
diffperct = 0.1
h= rep(p*diffperct,3)   #Difference between target and source
s = p/2
n0 = 100                  #target population size
nt = c(2000, 2000, 2000)    #source population size
n.test = 1000
intercept = rep(1, K+1)
```

### boxplot 3 by 3

```{r}
library(tidyr)
 LOOP=25 
 source('core_functions_v4_woodbury.R')
 diffloop<-c(1,2,5)
 ploop<-c(80,120,200)
 mselist<-matrix(0,LOOP,K+1+1+1+1)
for (k in diffloop) {
  for (j in ploop) {
 diffperct = k*0.1
 p = j
 s = p/2
 h= rep(p*diffperct,3)   #Difference between target and source

 # Only Target & M=0 to M=K
 mseout = matrix(0,LOOP,K+1+1+1+1)

# Simulation results  
for (loop in 1:LOOP) {
#set.seed(sim = loop)
 DATA<-data_generation(loop, p, s, K, n0, nt, h, sig.delta, intercept, exact, r, n.test)
 X.tar =DATA$X.tar
 X.src =DATA$X.src
 y.tar =DATA$y.tar
 y.src =DATA$y.src
 delta.TL =DATA$delta.TL
 wthreshold = DATA$wthreshold
 beta.tar = ginv(t(X.tar)%*%X.tar)%*%t(X.tar)%*%y.tar
 a<-beta_fastCOMMUTE_generation(K, method = "fastcommute",X.tar,X.src,y.tar,y.src,delta.TL,wthreshold)
 beta.true = DATA$beta.true

# Only Target
 mseout[loop,1] =mse.fun(beta.true, beta.tar)
# M=0 
 mseout[loop,2] = mse.fun(beta.true, a[[K+1]])
# M=1 to M=K 
 for(i in 1:K){
 mseout[loop,i+2] = mse.fun(beta.true, a[[i]])
    
 }
 # lable p and diff
 mseout[loop,6] = p
 mseout[loop,7] = diffperct

}
  mse
  mselist<-rbind(mselist,mseout)
  
  }
} 
 
```

### Give it a first try

```{r}
mselist2<-mselist[-c(1:25),]
mselist2<-as.data.frame(mselist2)
colnames(mselist2)<-c("Target-Only",c(0:K),"p","diff")
mseout_plt <- mselist2
mseout_df = 
  pivot_longer(
    mseout_plt, 
    1:(K+2),
    names_to = "Data", 
    values_to = "MSE")
mseout_df
```

### Add COMMUTE


```{r}
mselistCOMMUTE2<-mselistCOMMUTE[-c(1:175),]
mselistCOMMUTE2<-as.data.frame(mselistCOMMUTE2)
mseCOMMUTE_df <- mselistCOMMUTE2 |>
  rename( Data= methods,
         diff = diffperct,
         MSE = mseout)|>
  mutate(diff = as.numeric(diff),
         MSE = as.numeric(MSE),
         p = as.numeric(p))|>
  select(p,diff,Data,MSE)

```

### Combine fastCOMMUTE and COMMUTE

```{r}

mseout_df_combined<-rbind(mseCOMMUTE_df,mseout_df)

```

### Add groups

```{r}
mseout_df_combined$group <- "fastCOMMUTE"
mseout_df_combined$group[mseout_df_combined$Data =="Target-Only"] <-"Target"
mseout_df_combined$group[mseout_df_combined$Data =="w1"] <-"Source"
mseout_df_combined$group[mseout_df_combined$Data =="w2"] <-"Source"
mseout_df_combined$group[mseout_df_combined$Data =="w3"] <-"Source"
mseout_df_combined$group[mseout_df_combined$Data =="beta.syn123.M0"] <-"COMMUTE"
mseout_df_combined$group[mseout_df_combined$Data =="beta.syn123.M1"] <-"COMMUTE"
mseout_df_combined$group[mseout_df_combined$Data =="beta.syn123.M2"] <-"COMMUTE"
mseout_df_combined$group[mseout_df_combined$Data =="beta.TL123"] <-"COMMUTE"


```

### Making Plots

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplotify)
library(patchwork)
library(viridis)
library(reshape2)
library(ggplot2)
library(RColorBrewer)

mseout_df_arranged<-mseout_df_combined |>
  arrange(p,diff)

plot_list =list()
for (i in 1:9) {
  left<-(1+(i-1)*300)
  right<-300*i
  
  p <- mseout_df_arranged[left:right,] |>  
  ggplot(aes(x = Data, y = MSE, color = Data)) +
  geom_boxplot()+  
  facet_grid(cols = vars(group), scales = "free", space = "free")+
  # facet_wrap(~p+diff)+ 
  # omit legend
  theme(legend.position = "none",
        axis.text.x=element_text(angle=15,hjust=1))+
  # add meta-data
  labs(
      title    = i,
      x        = " "
  ) 
  
  plot_list[[i]] = p
}

library(gridExtra)
p1<-(plot_list[[1]] | plot_list[[2]]| plot_list[[3]]) / (plot_list[[4]] | plot_list[[5]]| plot_list[[6]])/
  (plot_list[[7]] | plot_list[[8]]| plot_list[[9]])
p1

ggsave("Crude_Boxplot.png",p1)
```








### boxplot seperate

```{r plots}
 library(tidyr)
 LOOP=1
 source('core_functions_v4_woodbury.R')
 diffloop<-c(1,2,5)
 ploop<-c(80,120,200)
for (k in diffloop) {
  for (j in ploop) {
 diffperct = k*0.1
 p = j
 s = p/2
 h= rep(p*diffperct,3)   #Difference between target and source

 # Only Target & M=0 to M=K
 mseout = matrix(0,LOOP,K+1+1)

# Simulation results  
for (loop in 1:LOOP) {
#set.seed(sim = loop)
 DATA<-data_generation(loop, p, s, K, n0, nt, h, sig.delta, intercept, exact, r, n.test)
 X.tar =DATA$X.tar
 X.src =DATA$X.src
 y.tar =DATA$y.tar
 y.src =DATA$y.src
 delta.TL =DATA$delta.TL
 wthreshold = DATA$wthreshold
 beta.tar = ginv(t(X.tar)%*%X.tar)%*%t(X.tar)%*%y.tar
 a<-beta_fastCOMMUTE_generation(K, method = "fastcommute",X.tar,X.src,y.tar,y.src,delta.TL,wthreshold)
 beta.true = DATA$beta.true

# Only Target
 mseout[loop,1] =mse.fun(beta.true, beta.tar)
# M=0 
 mseout[loop,2] = mse.fun(beta.true, a[[K+1]])
# M=1 to M=K 
 for(i in 1:K){
 mseout[loop,i+2] = mse.fun(beta.true, a[[i]])
    
 }

}



colnames(mseout)<-c("Target-Only",c(0:K))
mseout_plt <- as.data.frame(mseout)
mseout_df = 
  pivot_longer(
    mseout_plt, 
    1:(K+2),
    names_to = "Data", 
    values_to = "MSE")
mseout_df

msebox<-mseout_df |>
  # instantiate plot
  ggplot(aes(x = Data, y = MSE, color = Data)) +
  # add box plot
  geom_boxplot() +
  # omit legend
  theme(legend.position = "none") +
  # add meta-data
  labs(
      title    = "Distribution of MSE"
    , subtitle = paste("p =",p,"and diff(%) = ",diffperct*100, sep = " ")
    , x        = "Number of Calibrated sites"
    , y        = "MSE"
    , caption  = "Source: Xpool."
  )
filename<-paste("p",p,"diff",diffperct, sep = "-")
filename<-paste(filename,"png", sep = ".")
ggsave(filename,msebox)
  }
} 


```
